item.description:
Back by popular demand! Enjoy the view from the top of the hill at the Gouveia Vineyards, this time at the peak of the Autumn foliage (we hope).

Joe Grieco of the Cartells is scheduled to play. Music is 4 pm to 7 pm and this place gets packed on Saturday afternoons. Seating is first come, first served. Bring your own meal or snack; buy wine by the glass or bottle.

I'll bring the chicken!


Click here for Joe Grieco's bio.

Click here for directions to the vineyards.
item.how_to_find_us: Joanne is the contact person for this event.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Gouveia Vineyards in Wallingford
